rows.label: tlk70000075_03_msg001
rows.name:
It's not like this is the first time I've lost
a comrade in battle. I thought I knew
how to deal with this kind of thing.

rows.label: tlk70000075_03_msg002
rows.name:
But somehow I can't seem to accept
that MacNeth is just...gone.

rows.label: tlk70000075_03_msg003
rows.name:
I guess it was all so sudden that my
brain hasn't caught up...

rows.label: tlk70000075_03_msg004
rows.name:
If only I could at least understand
what was going through his mind
when it happened...
